{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with ACTION PERSONNEL OF OTTAWA HULL.

Across 37 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 21 have at least one amendment (57%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 179% and the average number of amendments was 1.81. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$3.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.99 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$195.6K. The longest contract was 4.04 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
